name: Zeus
description: Zeus is the king of the Greek gods, ruling over Mount Olympus and wielding the power of thunder.

name: Shiva
description: Shiva is one of the principal deities of Hinduism, known as the destroyer and regenerator of the universe.

name: Thor
description: Thor is the Norse god of thunder, known for his mighty hammer Mj√∂lnir and his protection of mankind.

name: Ra
description: Ra is the ancient Egyptian god of the sun, believed to sail across the sky each day in his solar boat.

name: Athena
description: Athena is the Greek goddess of wisdom, war strategy, and courage, born from the head of Zeus.

name: Vishnu
description: Vishnu is the preserver of the universe in Hinduism, known for his avatars like Rama and Krishna.

name: Odin
description: Odin is the chief Norse god, god of wisdom, poetry, death, and magic, and ruler of Asgard.

name: Jesus
description: Jesus is central to Christianity, believed to be the Son of God and savior of mankind.

name: Horus
description: Horus is the Egyptian god of the sky and kingship, often depicted as a falcon.

name: Kali
description: Kali is a fierce Hindu goddess who represents time, change, power, and destruction.
